content: I've been putting a lot of thought into the undertones, and I think "Comfort Gray" has a slightly warm undertone that will complement my furniture and decor nicely. I haven't considered "Rainwashed" or "Driftwood Grey" yet, but I might take a look at those shades as well. Thanks for the suggestions! By the way, I'm really happy with how my living room is coming along after the furniture rearrangement.
